name: 25th Edition Cologne Spray for Men
description: 25th Edition for Men® is a fluid, aromatic fougére fragrance with a sensuous masculine blend of fruity, herbaceous and woody notes that are forever fresh and forever lasting. The topnote blends aromatic notes of crushed basil and Mediterranean lavender with refreshing combination of iced pineapple and Calabrian bergamot. The slightly fruity aromatic impression continues into the heart, where geranium and tea leaves are accented by Granny Smith apple. The fragrance evolves to reveal a masculine base of oakmoss, Mysore sandalwood, sensual musks, Virginian cedarwood and tonka bean.

name: Aloe Cleanser
description: Aloe Cleanser is prepared from hypo- allergenic ingredients to create a light, non-greasy, non-irritating lotion that is pH and moisture-balanced. It is fat and thorough in removing makeup, dirt, and other invisible skin debris. Use it as the first step in preparing your skin for a full Aloe Facial, or simply in the daily, routine skin care program of our Aloe Restorative Beauty Regime. Aloe Cleanser contains just the right amount of Jojoba Oil and Water to leave your skin feeling fresh and thoroughly clean without drying!
ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Stabilized Aloe VeravGel/gel d’aloès Officinali stabilisè), Water (Aqua), Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Disodium Stearate Cocoamphodiacetate, PEG-100 Stearate, Diethylhexyl Adipate, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Simmondsia Chinesis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Triethanolamine, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Absorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sorbic Acid, Methylisothiazolinone, Fragrance (Parfum).
directions: With your fingertips, slowly spread drops of Aloe Cleanser across your entire face and neck area, using a smooth, circular motion. To remove makeup, dirt and Dean skin debris, gently wipe away with a dampened cloth or tissue, leaving the skin feeling clean, soft and supple. Follow with the Rehydrating Toner if desired.

benefits: Every first-aid kit should have one
Burns, chickenpox, minor bleeding, insect bites, sunburn, on stitched area following caecerian section or hysterectomy, circumcised area, cuts and grazes.

name: Awakening Eye Cream
description:
Introducing “Awakening Eye” – a revolutionary eye serum designed to rejuvenate and revitalize tired, puffy eyes, bringing forth a radiant and youthful appearance. Crafted with a potent blend of natural ingredients and cutting-edge technology, this innovative serum targets common concerns such as dark circles, fine lines, and under-eye puffiness.
At the heart of “Awakening Eye” lies a proprietary formula infused with nourishing botanical extracts, including green tea, cucumber, and vitamin E. These ingredients work synergistically to soothe and hydrate the delicate skin around the eyes, reducing puffiness and promoting a brighter, more awakened look.
But what sets “Awakening Eye” apart is its advanced peptide complex, meticulously formulated to stimulate collagen production and improve skin elasticity. With regular use, this powerful blend helps diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, restoring a smooth and youthful contour to the eye area.
The lightweight texture of “Awakening Eye” allows for effortless application and quick absorption, leaving behind no greasy residue. Its gentle formulation makes it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
Whether you’re dealing with early signs of aging, late nights, or environmental stressors, “Awakening Eye” is your ultimate solution for refreshed, luminous eyes. Say goodbye to tired-looking eyes and hello to a brighter, more vibrant gaze with “Awakening Eye” – the key to unlocking your inner radiance.
Experience the transformative power of “Awakening Eye” and embark on a journey to awaken your beauty from within. Let your eyes shine with confidence and vitality, courtesy of “Awakening Eye” – your go-to companion for radiant, youthful-looking eyes.
—
This description highlights the key features and benefits of the fictional product “Awakening Eye,” emphasizing its ability to rejuvenate and revitalize the delicate skin around the eyes for a more refreshed and youthful appearance.

name: Forever Bee Honey
description: Bees make honey by traveling from flower to flower, removing the rich nectar, storing it briefly to mix with their enzymes, then depositing the honey in their hives. Throughout the ages, honey has been recognized as a premium natural food – a storehouse to nutritional goodness that is easily digested.

name: Forever Bee Pollen
description: Pollen is the fertilizing dust of flowers. Bees gather and bring it back to their hives for food. Without pollen, plants, trees, and flowers could not exist; even we depend on it.

name: Forever Bee Propolis
description: When we think of bees, honey and pollen are foremost in our thoughts. Yet another important substance, propolis is a sticky resin collected by bees. Honeybees collect and metabolize the propolis, then line their hives with it to protect the hive. It’s so effective, the interior of the beehive is said to be safer than most operating rooms. The name Propolis is derived from the Greek word meaning ‘before the city’, signifying that propolis defended the entire community from external threat. Propolis has a 5000-year old history. The Assyrians and the Greeks used propolis to help maintain good health. Fortified with royal jelly, Forever Bee Propolis® is an excellent way to help support the body’s natural defenses.

name: FOREVER BRIGHT TOOTHGEL
description: Forever Bright Toothgel is a premium oral care product designed to promote dental hygiene and support overall oral health. On top of this popular Asian fruit, we added chromium picolinate, which if deficient, can cause fatigue and excess fat production.

name: Forever Royal Jelly
description: Royal Jelly is a milky secretion derived from the pharyngeal glands of the honey bee. This “super food” of the bees is specially blended with enzymes and fed to each bee destined to become a queen. It is the exclusive food of the queen bee throughout her highly productive life, enabling her to lay up to 3,000 eggs per day during her six-year lifespan. Worker bees eating ordinary honey live only four to six weeks.

name: Forever Vision
description: Our vision is a precious sense, and one that we should not take for granted. While we may supplement our diets with nutrients to enhance our overall wellbeing, we need to overlook our eyesight as a necessary part of our health to maintain.

name: Forever Arctic Sea
description: Forever living Arctic-Sea is a supplement that contains Vitamin E, Fish oil, and olive oil. The main nutrients of this product are fatty acids which are required to protect the membrane that surrounds every one of our cells. These are also the major building block of protein and body fat in appropriate amounts to cushion and protect our internal organs. The human body cannot naturally make the omega-3 fatty acids which are commonly found in fish. Forever Arctic Sea’s blend of natural fish, calamari, and oleic olive oil contain the perfect balance of essential fatty acids EPA – which contributes to the normal function of the heart – and DHA – which contributes to the maintenance of normal brain function.

name: infinite By Forever Advanced Skincare
description: Infinite by Forever is the latest Anti-aging skincare set for both men and women. The set contains four products that work together perfectly: Hydrating Cleanser, Firming Serum, Restoring Creme and Firming Complex. This powerful skincare helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and gives you a radiant, hydrated skin. It is based on Aloe Vera and is reinforced with various natural plant extracts.

name: infinite by Forever Firming Complex
description: We all know that beauty is more than skin deep – it starts with nutrition. The perfect companion to firming serum, firming complex targets aging from inside out! Forever’s first exclusive beauty supplement will help you take control of the aging process and ensure that you are supporting anti-aging from all angles.

name: infinite by Forever Firming Serum
description: infinite by Forever™ Firming Serum helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. It supports hydration, elasticity of the skin and gives you a fresh look. It contains trifluoroacetyl tripeptider-2 to increase the firmness of the skin. Hydrolyzed sodium hyaluronate is a substance that supports hydration and skin caring effect. Yeast extract helps support the natural production of collagen and also helps to reduce the appearance of uneven skin tone.
directions: Pump once and apply in quick but gentle sweeping motions over the entire face. Apply additional pump to the neck area, sweeping upwards towards the chin for more youthful looking skin. Use in the morning and evening after cleansing for best results.

name: infinite By Forever Hydrating Cleanser
description: infinite By Forever™ Hydrating Cleanser is full of potent, naturally derived ingredients like apple extract, apple amino acid and cocoa fatty acids that increase the skin hydration and gently wash away dirt and oil without drying. This mild, moisturizing, milky cleanser will leave the skin feeling hydrated, soft and clean to lay a strong foundation for the rest of your anti-aging routine.
directions: With wet fingers, softly massage upwards and outwards in circular motions towards the hair line. Rinse thoroughly for smooth, clean skin and gently pat skin dry with a towel. Use in the morning and in the evening for best results.

name: Osteoarthritis forever living
description: Osteoarthritis is the most common form of arthritis, affecting millions of people worldwide. It occurs when the protective cartilage that cushions the ends of your bones wears down over time.

name: R3 Factor Skin Defence Creme
description: Help your skin RETAIN its natural moisture, RESTORE its resilience and RENEW its appearance with R3 Factor® Skin Defense Creme – a rich combination of stabilized Aloe Vera gel, soluble collagen and alpha-hyroxy acids, fortified with vitamins A and E, each vital to healthy skin.
benefits: Helps maintain healthy skin color, texture and feel
Retains, Restores and Renews your skin.
ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Gel (Stabilized Aloe Vera Gel), Water, Butylene Glycol, Squalane, Methyl Gluceth-20, Cetyl Dimethicone, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Laureth-7, Tocopheryl Linoleate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol Acetate, Glycolic Acid, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugar Cane) Extract, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Retinyl Palmitate, Soluble Collagen, PEG-100 Stearate, Absorbic Acid,Triethanolamine, Diazolidinyl Urea, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Fragrance.
directions: After cleansing, apply to face, neck and other areas where needed. For best results, use both morning and night. May be followed by Firming Foundation Lotion and/or makeup or by Recovering Night Creme at night, if desired.

name: Rehydrating Toner
description: Rehydrating Toner is a non-drying, alcohol-free formula that contains natural aloe vera and witch hazel, together with special skin moisturizers and plant extracts, for toning the skin. It also contains collagen and allantoin for cell conditioning.
benefits: Contains aloe vera, witch hazel, plant extracts, and collagen
ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Stabilized Aloe Vera Gel/gel d’aloès officinali stabilisè), Water (Aqua), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water (non-alcoholic), Propanediol, Soluble Collagen, Citrus Medica Limonum (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Equisetum Hiemale Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Triethanolamine, Allantoin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Methylisothiazolinone, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hixanediol, Menthol, Fragrance (Parfum).
directions: Using a cotton ball, apply Rehydrating Toner in an upward motion every morning and evening. Continue until no further discoloration of the cotton ball is evident. Your skin will feel well conditioned, with tightened pores, for a smoother appearance.

name: The Natural Solution for Erectile dysfunction
description: Erectile dysfunction (ED) is a huge challenge for many men today regardless of their age. Having erection trouble infrequently isn’t necessarily a cause for concer. However, if erectile dysfunction isan ongoing issue, however, it can cause stress, affect your self- confidence and contribute to relationship problems.

name: Vitolize Men
description: Although the exact age may vary, prostate health eventually becomes and important issue for all men. Vitolize™Men’s Vitality supplement contains all of the power of Forever Pro6, but now also includes more nutrients, more bio-available nutrient forms and more powerful botanicals.
benefits: Proprietary botanical blend including sawpalmetto, pygeum and pumpkin seed
Proper nutrient balance for complete prostate support
Provides Polyphenol-equivalent to eating an entire pomegranate fruit.

name: Vitolize Women
description: Discomfort due to Post Menopausal Syndrome (PMS), menopause, or less than optimal urinary tract function may be related to hormone changes and specific nutritional needs. The natural blend of antioxidants-rich fruits, herbs, vitamins and minerals in Vitolize™ Women’s Vitality Supplement is specifically designed with a woman’s needs in mind.
benefits: Proprietary botanical blend including apple powder, passionflower and schisandra berry
Promotes hormone balance to help you feel yourself at all times
Specifically designed with a woman’s needs in mind
